== Quotes ==
{{quote|It's cool taking an existing Minecraft mob, adding some sort of character and story behind it, and then translating what that might look like to a Minecraft skin. The result being something still Minecraft looking, with a cool unique flair to it.|Mithey on Minecraft.net}}
